item.description:
At my most recent event this past sunday afternoon, there was a BIG interest for a games night. I personally do like the idea and am personally happy to hostess this event. However, I am requesting to PLEASE BE RESPECTIVE as I am planning this event in my home. I honestly am a bit nervous about doing so, however I personally had gone to Meet Up events at other peoples homes and 99 percent it has not been a problem. If you are concerned and don't feel you have a good comfort level, please feel free to e mail myself personally and we can certainly talk.
I also thought it's Spring time already and it might be fun to do a pot luck too! I had created a list and when you RSVP, please quote what number you will be bringing to avoid duplicate food items. (cut and pate if that may work).
Please feel free to bring any kinds of games whether it's Taboo, Settlers of Catan, Boggle, etc..... I personally have Apples to Apples, Scrabble, Clue, Scattergories, and some others that may be of interest.
Here is the list for the pot luck:


3. Appetizer #3 (enough for 6 people)- cheese/crackers (would like from one of the attendees)

5. Main dish with meat (enough for 6 people)
6. Main dish with out meat (enough for 6 people)

8. Garden Salad (enough for 12 people) (would definitely like from attendee)
9. Ceasar/other type of salad (enough for 12 people)
10. Side dish #1(enough for 6 people)
11. Side dish #2 (enough for 6 people)
12. Side dish #3 (enough for 6 people) (bread/rolls would like from an attendee)
13. Dessert #1 (cake/pie enough for 12 people)

15. Dessert #3 fruit platter/ fruit salad enough for 12 people


18. beer- one 12 pack

I, the hostess will provide all the paper products and Will take appetizer #1
I will be updating the list as people respond. Please be sure to bring enough as i had attended some other pot lucks where the selection was very slim.

My place is T accessable. You can take Bus #71 to Mt Auburn Street and Bigelow Ave if coming by "T". There is plenty of parking around as the meters are free after 6:00 PM. Please use mapquest in regards for directions to my place. I will distribute my phone number to people who do sign up as a "yes" closer to the date as it is a private number in case if you do need to call if lost. Please look on your email thru out the say on satruday for my number.
Looking foward to my 3rd event and hopefully that this will be a success.
Lastly, Please be sure to help with clean up before you depart and also PLEASE be 90 percent you are attending as this IS a pot luck event.
item.how_to_find_us: Please ring door bell #14 , say you are part of meet up, and I will let you in

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Last minute Spring Pot Luck/ Games Night
